name: 15-Minute Meatloaf

ingredients.name: lean ground beef, pork, turkey, chicken, or ground soy

preparation: In a bowl, combine egg and egg whites.
Add all remaining ingredients except Marinara Sauce and mix to combine. Place in a Rectangular Steamer and press down to pack lightly.
Cover with lid and microwave on high for 9–10 minutes. Let rest for 5 minutes, then turn out of steamer, drizzle with sauce, and slice.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 2 cups salad, with 2 tbsp prepared Epicure dressing or Caprese Salad, and 1 small bun/roll with 1 tsp butter.
